title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competencies: Simulation-Based Parachute Descent Procedure Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic aircraft structures and emergency response principles
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Can explain the five-step safety check procedure during parachute descent with 90% accuracy
Can determine the appropriate timing for parachute deployment in emergency scenarios with a simulation success rate of over 85%
Can accurately reproduce emergency procedures three or more times using standard communication protocols with team members
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
